data.title: Dinner time
data.text: Awesome bbq ribs, great sides, fast service, reasonable priced, would highly recommend. If you want a great family place to eat 4Rs is the place

data.title: Great Downtown Location for Barbeque
data.text: I have heard about 4 Rivers for several years but had the opportunity to visit this week. We were downtown on business and stopped in for lunch. be aware that if you go during the lunch hours, you will be standing in line for about 20-30 minutes; but the wait is worth it. This is 'real' BBQ and they have a nice menu to select from. Sandwiches come with 2 sides and platters come with 3. The Mac N Cheese is great and the slaw is excellent...real North Carolina style.

data.title: 4R = 4 Star
data.text:
Great brisket, ribs in a picnic experience. Get in line and start filling your plate. You can't make a mistake. The sides are phenomenal. Great BBQ beans, potato salad, sweet potato and on and on. Tender super smoked ribs and brisket. Few compare. Exceptionally helpful and friendly staff. They even have a wide selection of hard to find old fashioned soft drinks in bottles. BBQ sauces are super, but rarely needed as the smoke is the star of the show. A not to miss----better than the others in Tx & Tn. Really!
This place is great. Often times a line to get in, but it moves. Tons of choices for all, even veggies who will savor the sides.

data.title: THIS IS IT ! WOW,A Gem.I'll B Back
data.text:
FYI: I am SOOO GLAD THEY ARE OPENING THEIR 13th Location IN SOUTH TAMPA. On Swann & Mc Dill!!

Had to drop someone off at the Orlando City Hall. Stopped at the front lot, found on Yelp. The 4 Rivers Smokehouse. 
I am so glad I did not venture off in the chilly wind. In the middle of Lunch Rush Hour. 

When you get here. You get in line to place your order. I met two very nice young ladies. That offered info. On the different options of ordering smaller portions of the menu listed items.

If your appetite is not Really Big. For this time of day. For example, instead of the large Brisket Sandwich. 
I went for the Brisket Sliders. You can have 2
And 2 Sides. I did 1 with 1 side(Fries).
The Brisket was Juicy, cut to perfection. The people that work here have Customer Satisfaction Down to PERFECTION:-!
My food was served Promptly. Everything here is Superrr CLEAN. 

I hope To Be Back SOON. A++ to Their Bryant, Mgr. speaks so highly of his employees. He seems to have great work ethic. 

This place is a MUST TRY.

data.title: 4 Rivers Breakfast at Downtown Orlando
data.text: Ordered the chicken tender biscuit breakfast to go and stomach turned once I received it. It smelled so heavily fried, it reminded me of fried Chinese food. Not particularly appetizing to me at 8 a.m. The biscuit was also yellow from so much butter. Without even a bite, I immediately gave it away to one of my co-workers back at the office, who enjoyed it. So, while some may enjoy their breakfast, it was too heavy for me to even consider it. I'll stick to the Chick-Filet chicken biscuit.

data.title: Great downtown breakfast and dinner
data.text: The downtown location offers a convenient mix of menu items from two of Winter Park's best, 4Rivers and the Coop. The location offers a traditional menu or a quick grab and go counter for breakfast and lunch. Breakfast is the best downtown including the very popular beef brisket burrito. Who can pass up brisket in the morning. The line can build fast at lunch but is worth the wait. When in a hurry I grab a pulled pork sandwich from the grab and go counter. Sides are a must including the banana bread pudding, fried okra and of course the beans.
